snippet.title: GLITCHED OUT - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST 'GLITCHED OUT' ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2661260/?snr=1_5_9__205

Glitched Out is my very first game, releasing under my newly founded game dev studio - SHB Games. 

Glitched Out tells the story of IT Engineer ‘Lex’, who wakes in a government research facility to learn a malware has run rampant. The facility is home to many alien entities who have escaped containment and now stalk our hapless hero through the complex. Lex’s only hope is to team up with an A.I companion known as ‘Chip’ and hack her way to freedom. Along the way Lex and Chip encounter a host of entities, both friendly and hostile, as they seek to uncover the mysterious origin of the security outbreak.

Stay tuned for more information on Glitched Out coming very soon, including a look at the talented team I'm working with to bring the game to life.
